text: @SpeakerPelosi No hero. He’s a liar & corrupt. Just like you, Schumer and Schiff. Schiff said he had bullet proof evidence that would impeach trump. Didn’t see any of it! He lied. you wasted taxpayer $ and time on a fake impeachment. Now you do the same with the coronavirus! You r not helpful.
